GSP29vnyps00u:3_1: prabandharatnamidaṃ jayati jīvitamiva nyāyavistarasya vidyāsthānasya śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivarakṣuṇṇavartmano
GSP29vnyps00u:4: anupajīvya cedaṃ vidyāsthānaṃ ko vibhavaḥ sapanditumapi śeṣasya vidyāsthānajātasya ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:5: sarvameva hi loke śrutaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyāmāhitapāriplavaṃ vātyāspṛṣṭamiva tṛṇaśakalaṃ na kathañcidapi pratitiṣṭhati /
GSP29vnyps00u:6: pramāṇaparīkṣayā tu yathāvadupapāditayā dṛṣadeva vyapoḍhavikṣobhaṃ niṣkampamavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29vnyps00u:8: padavākyapramāṇabhedena hi tredhā vibhajanti śāstraṃ śāstravidaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:13: svātmanyapyanupajātavisrambhāṃ ḍolāyamānāṃ buddhiṃ kareṇumiva tarkaśṛṅkhalābhirālānayanmananavyapadeśaṃ śāstram ; yasya saṃjñāntaraṃ nyāyavistaraḥ tarkaśāstram ityādi //
GSP29vnyps00u:14: tadetat pramāṇapradhānamapi pramāṇagateḥ prameyasvarūpavivecanaparyavasānatayā prameyepi nyastapadaṃ pravṛttam /
GSP29vnyps00u:15_1: cānyathā ca prameyaṃ pratipadyamānairitastataḥ parikṛṣyamāṇāni pramāṇānyapi parāvṛttarūpatayā
GSP29vnyps00u:16: mānābhāsavyāmiśrāṇi hi mānāni na sukarāṇi vivektum /
GSP29vnyps00u:17: tadevaṃ śāstrameva paṅkilīkṛtaṃ cakṣuriva timiropasṛṣṭaṃ vigalitārthagrahaṇāpāṭava saṃvṛttam
GSP29vnyps00u:19_0: ataḥ sarvopayogāya doṣaguṇahānopādānābhyāṃ śikṣaṇīyasyāsya nyāyavistarasya pṛthakprasthānaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:19_1: nyāyadarśanaṃ nāma sūtrajātaṃ gautamena muninā prathamaṃ praṇītam ; yatra pramāṇāpramāṇādivivecanayā
GSP29vnyps00u:19_2: tattvanirṇayopāyāstatra ca saṃbhavanto guṇadoṣāḥ kathāsu ca grāhyāparihāryavibhāgāḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:20: tacca nyāyadarśanaṃ prathamaṃ pramāṇaprameyādisūtreṇa ṣoḍaśadhā padārthān vibhajya tatparīkṣaṇena caritārthama /
GSP29vnyps00u:22_0: tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyābhāvān vitathamevāpadārthān padārthayatā tathāvidhameva
GSP29vnyps00u:22_1: cānyadanyadālapatā grāhyamagṛhṇatā tyājyaṃ cātyajatā kaṇabhakṣeṇa dūramapathīkṛtaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:22_2: śāstrapatha iti brahmasūtrakārādibhiḥ pratikṣipto vaiśeṣikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:23_1: iti manyamānāḥ katipayasaṃskārasaṃskṛtamimaṃ pakṣaṃ parigṛhya nibandhān nibabandhuḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:24: te ca nibandhā eṣu divaseṣu nāmnaiva
GSP29vnyps00u:30_0: mātulena ca vādihaṃsāmbuvāhaḥ iti praśastināmāṅkitena ātreyarāmānujācāryeṇa kṛtaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:30_2: tatra tatra bhūyiṣṭhamudāhriyante yadeva yāvadeva cācāryeṇa kvacit kvacidudāhṛtaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:37_1: prācāmācāryāṇāṃ vāgvistarā etarhi śrotumapi durlabhatāṃ gamitārḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:38: idṛśoyaṃ vidyāvadhaḥ kasya vā vidyāvyasanino na dūnoti mānasam ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:40: asyaivācāryasya vāṅmadhuniṣyando mudhaiva kiyān na visraṃsitaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:43_3: granthajātāni tatra vedānte tāvat tattvaṭīkā nāma śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivaraviracitasya
GSP29vnyps00u:44: sā ca prathamasūtramātramapi yāvadasamagropalabdhapracārā vedāntavidyāvicārakāṅkṣiṇāṃ cintāvyasanāyaiva khaṇḍabhūtā paridṛśyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:45: vicitrāyodhanākuṇṭhaśaktau tejasvini svāṃ śakti samagramadarśayitvaiva niyatiyaiyātyenākasmāduparataṃ yodharatne taṭasthadṛṣṭe kasya vā vīradharmamanutiṣṭhato hṛdayaṃ na dūyeta /
GSP29vnyps00u:47: kecinmanyeran ācāryaireva na samāpūritāyaṃ grantha iti, tadetat svopamānena sarvatra śaktiparicchedaṃ kalayatāṃ pralapitamatra na kramate /
GSP29vnyps00u:49: śrutān yathāśrutamarthān patreṣu viniveśya prakāśayanto lokamanugṛhṇanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:53_0: anye tu nirantarabhajanakṛtaprasadanena bhagavatā sarveśvareṇa dūrapratyūḍhapratyūhavipruṣo
GSP29vnyps00u:53_3: prabandhakṛtaḥ; yeṣāmekapratibhāsūtrasyūtāni prameyaratnāni punaḥ punaḥ pariśīlitānyapi
GSP29vnyps00u:53_4: navanavānīva prajñāvatāṃ hṛdayeṣu kamapi camatkāramāvahanti na ca kadācit purāṇacitravad
GSP29vnyps00u:54: nyāpariśuddhikṛdācāryastu dvitīyatṛtīyayorubhayorapri kakṣyayoḥ hārāvalyoriva nāyakamaṇiḥ prakāśata iti tattvavidāmaparokṣam /
GSP29vnyps00u:57_1: evaṅguṇena cācāryacūḍāmaṇipavanā śiṣyabuddhiṃ prasādayitumārabdhā kṛtirasamāpya madhye
GSP29vnyps00u:57_2: apaviddhā bhavatīti ko nukhalu prabhāvavedī pratipattumarhati ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:62: iti svakṛtasya bhāṣyapravacanasya aṣṭāviṃśyāmāvṛttau tattvaṭīkānibandhapraṇayanamācāryastattvaṭīkāprārambhe svayameva spaṣṭamāha /
GSP29vnyps00u:65: śreyaḥ śrīmān veṅkaṭanāthaḥ śrutipathyaṃ nāthaprītyai nāṭakamarthyaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:67: iti sūtradhāravācā śārīrakabhāṣyapravacanaṃ saṃkalpasūryodayanirmāṇakāle triṃśadvārakṛtaṃ prathayati /
GSP29vnyps00u:68: tadānīmeva triṃśadvāraṃ śārīrakabhāṣyapravacanamāsīdyadi, tataḥ paścāt pravacanāvṛttayastatopi hi bhūyasyo bhavitumarhanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:71: śatadūṣaṇyāḥ samanantaraṃ tattvaṭīkā kṛteti ca pratīyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:77: pravartitā ca pātreṣu tasmai śreṣṭhāya maṅgalam //
GSP29vnyps00u:83: pratipādyantu, naite śrutaprakāśikāyāmanyatra vā granthāntare pratipattuṃ sulabhāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:84: kiñca svācāryairvādihaṃsāmbuvāhāryaiḥ praṇīte vidyamāna eva hi nyāyakuliśākhye nyāyanibandharatne nyāyapariśuddhimācāryaḥ svayaṃ nibabandha /
GSP29vnyps00u:85: avaśyavaktavyeṣu cārtheṣu joṣaṃbhāvaḥ kathañcidapi śāsrācāryatāyāḥ sadṛśo na bhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:89_1: mahāmatibhirapi sarvajñasakāśāt śuśrūṣitasya pratipādanārthamapūrvāyāḥ kṛteḥ samārambha
GSP29vnyps00u:90: kiñca nijanibandhasya śrutaprakāśikārakṣaṇāṅgīkārasamaya eva labdhaprasaratāmanusmṛtya parakīyagranthapravacanamaṅgīkṛtamācāryairiti śakyamabhyūhitum /
GSP29vnyps00u:93: yathāhi nyāyasiddhāñjanamapi jaḍadravyaparicche denaiva paryavasitaṃ sāṃprataṃ paridṛśyate, adravyaparicchedastu patita eva /
GSP29vnyps00u:97: jñātavyamanyadapi tairniraṇāyi samya- ggranthāntareṣviti na kiñcidihāsti
GSP29vnyps00u:102: śeṣe tu mithyaiva kimapyaitihyaṃ kalpayitvā katipaye prajalpanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:103_0: yattāvat dvaitamatakhaṇḍanaparaḥ śeṣo granthaḥ madhvamatasthena kenacidyatinā bhikṣāmaṭatā
GSP29vnyps00u:103_1: savinayamupasṛtya prārthitoyamācāryaḥ taṃ tasya bhikṣārthe prāyacchiditi, tadapi
GSP29vnyps00u:103_2: na vicārakṣamam na hyācāryagrantheṣu kvacidapi madhvamataṃ nirasyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:106: śatadūṣaṇī ca śaṅkādikṛtasūtravyākhyānādinirāsārthameva pravṛtteti ca tadgranthamukha eva sphuṭībhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:107: tatra hi ---- “prācīmupetya padavīṃ yatirājadṛṣṭāṃ tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:108: prājñā yathoditamidaṃ śukavat paṭhantaḥ pracchannabauddhavijaye parito
GSP29vnyps00u:111: atra 'tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ' ityanena dvaitinaḥ svapakṣīkriyante /
GSP29vnyps00u:118: ' ityatra tu śaṅkarādītyādipadaṃ yādavabhāskarayoḥ saṃgrahāyeti sthitam /
GSP29vnyps00u:121_0: kiñcidupanyasyate---kṛṣṇamiśro hi gauḍadeśīyaḥ paṇḍitacūḍāmaṇiḥ sarvāsu vidyāsu kalāsu
GSP29vnyps00u:121_1: ca saviśeṣakṛtaśramaḥ kaviśca brahmādvaitaṃ siddhantamātiṣṭhamāno vādakutūhalitayā
GSP29vnyps00u:121_2: sarvā diśaḥ paryaṭan jitakāśī krameṇa dakṣiṇāndiśamācakrāma /
GSP29vnyps00u:122: tatra śrīraṅgaṃ divyakṣetraṃ viduṣāmāvāsamākarṇya devasevāpadeśena vādasamaramarthayamānaḥ śrīraṅgarājasya bhavagataḥ prāsādamāsadāda /
GSP29vnyps00u:123_0: tadānīṃ tatra bhāṣāmayīrgāthāḥ sarāgatālaṃ gīyamānā niśamya tatkartṝṇāṃ ca kavīnāṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:123_1: varṇāvarāṇāmapi pratimāstasmin devālaye devopacārairārādhyamānā viditvā tatra sevāsamavetān
GSP29vnyps00u:124: prājñāḥ, bhavatāmanenāpabhraṃśapāṭhena varṇāvarapūjanena ca dūrāpoḍhaṃ veṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:126: anthathākṛtamakṛtaṃ hi bhavati' iti sākṣepaṃ papraccha /
GSP29vnyps00u:127_0: yadā tairmilitairapi na kiñcidākṣepasadṛśamuttaraṃ pratipannaṃ, tadā tadātanāya taddeśādhipataye
GSP29vnyps00u:127_1: tamarthamāvedya, pratiṣṭhāprabhṛti sarva evālayasaṃskāraḥ kāryaḥ pratyagra eva iti
GSP29vnyps00u:129_1: durante duḥkhasāgare nimagnāstaṃ ca prativādinaṃ sarvavidyāviśāradaṃ vādāhavanavaśūramaprakampyamākalayantaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:129_2: sabhāmabhinavāṃ kāmapi saṃgamayya tasyānarthasya kiñcidapi pratividhānaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:130: tasmin mahati sadasi viduṣāṃ saṃpradāyācāryaḥ śrīmān lokācāryaḥ sarveṣāṃ sabhāsadāmavadheyavacanaḥ samarthāmabhyarhitāṃ vācamādade--- “bhoḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:134: asti kila kāñcyāṃ nagaryāṃ veṅkaṭanāthāryo nāma viduṣāṃ prathamaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:135: sa hi vṛṣaśailanāthasya ghaṇṭāṃśa evāvatīrṇaḥ iti tattvavidāṃ grahaṇam /
GSP29vnyps00u:136_0: soyaṃ pañcavarṣadeśīyaḥ śiśureva san nijamātulena vādihaṃsāmbuvāhenātreyarāmānujācāryeṇa
GSP29vnyps00u:136_1: śārīrakabhāṣyagrahaṇāya varadagurusakāśaṃ gacchatā priyabhāgineyena nītastatra bhāṣyaviṣaye
GSP29vnyps00u:136_2: prasaktān bahūn saṃdehaśṛṅkhalāgranthīn visraṃsayaṃstayā tatrasamavetayā prajñāvṛddhapariṣadā
GSP29vnyps00u:138: ' ityāśiṣaṃ prayuñjānena 'asya kumārasya svataḥ pratibhātasamastaśāstrārthasārasya vidyāsaṃskāramātraphalo
GSP29vnyps00u:140: na tu jñāne kaścidapi śaktileśa ādheyo bhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:141: bhagavānapi hi devakīnandanaḥ vidyāgrahaṇāya sāṃdīpinerācāryasya sakāśe gurukulavāsamagrahīt
GSP29vnyps00u:142: kiṃ cāsya śaiśava evāyaṃ prajñāprakarṣo dāśaratheriva vikramatiśayo janmasiddhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:144: sābhyasūyāḥ savismāyā vā dṛśo nāsmin bālavayasi patitumarhanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:145: dṛṣṭidoṣairhi viṣānalairiva prasaradbhistarava ivāvalāḍhāḥ kati nāma mahāguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ svaguṇairlokamanupakṛtyaivāstaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:147: śrībhagavadrāmānujasiddhāntasyaiṣa jayadhvajaḥ samucchrīyatām' iyādiśya śiśurasau nijamātule vādihaṃsāmbudācārye nyāsīkṛtaḥ //
GSP29vnyps00u:148: athāsau vayasā viṃśativarṣadeśīya eva san sarvatomukhaprasṛtaprabodhatayā pareṣāmanabhibhavanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:149_0: evamakṣayyapratibhādraviṇena sarveṣvapi ca tantreṣu nirāmayaṃ panthānamavagantuṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:149_1: prasādayituṃ cālaṅkarmīṇena cācāryeṇā sārdhaṃ kadācit kāñcīnagare devadevasya bhagavataḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:150_1: kṛtapraśastināmadheyo mādhavācāryo nāma vedabhāṣyakṛt vādāhave lagno niraṅkuśaniśitatarkaśarāsāravarṣiṇaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:151: tena ca mādhavācāryeṇa svīye sarvadarśanasaṃgrahe rāmānujadarśanamupakṣipatā--- 'taduktaṃ
